original: Collin, Erik Gustaf, notarie, Kinna, f. 5/10/00 i Skara av köpm. Gustaf C. o. Anna Odhner. G. 40 m. Ingrid Andersson. Barn: Bo f. 46. — Stud:-ex. i Skara 19, DHS, kansliex. v. Sthlms högsk. Anst. h. adv. Gunnar Coll-in i Lidköp., v. A-B Gbgs Hand:-bank i Borås, dir. f. N. Marks Egna-hem^s A-B i Kinna sed. 45, inneh. av Kinna Juridiska Byrå sed. 36. Led. av istyr. f. A-B Gbgs Bank i Kinna, ordf. i hyresnd i Kinna 42, Skene 42, Fritsla 44 o. Seglora 44.
translated: Collin, Erik Gustaf, clerk, Kinna, born on October 5th, 1900 in Skara to merchant Gustaf C. and Anna Odhner. Married in 1940 to Ingrid Andersson. They had a son named Bo, born in 1946. He completed his high school studies in Skara in 1919, obtained a DHS degree, and a clerkship at Stockholm University. He was employed by lawyer Gunnar Coll-in in Lidköp., A-B Gbgs Hand:-bank in Borås, N. Marks Egna-hem^s A-B in Kinna from 1945, and became the owner of Kinna Juridiska Byrå since 1936. He was a board member of A-B Gbgs Bank in Kinna, chairman of the rental board in Kinna (1942), Skene (1942), Fritsla (1944) and Seglora (1944).
